Hotels: Crowne Plaza - Marseille Le Dôme
Full_Descriptions:
Situated in Marseille, 2.8 km from La Timone Metro Station, Crowne Plaza - Marseille Le Dôme features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers room service, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests.

The units at the hotel are fitted with a seating area, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. All rooms will provide guests with a desk and a coffee machine.

Breakfast is available each morning, and includes buffet, continental and American options.

Languages spoken at the reception include English, Spanish, French and Italian.

Vieux Port Metro station is 4.1 km from Crowne Plaza - Marseille Le Dôme, while Castellane Metro Station is 4.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 23 km from the accommodation.

Hotels: Sous le Clocher
Full_Descriptions:
Sous le Clocher is a self-catering accommodation set in an old convent located in Marseille.  The property is 500 metres from Vieux Port Metro station. Free WiFi access is available.

The apartment features a fully equipped open-plan kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave. The private bathroom has a shower and a hairdryer. You can enjoy a garden view. Extras include a washing machine, a sofa and ironing facilities.

Many bars and restaurants can be found within a 5-minute walk.

If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out Palais du Pharo (1 km). Marseille Provence Airport is located 20 km away.

Hotels: Maison Dormoy
Full_Descriptions:
Situated in Marseille, 2.9 km from Saint-Ferreol Street and 3.2 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre, Maison Dormoy features free WiFi.

A continental breakfast is available each morning at the property.

Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations is 3.4 km from Maison Dormoy, while Marseille Chanot Exhibition and Convention Centre is 3.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 29 km from the accommodation.

Hotels: Toyoko INN Marseille Saint Charles
Full_Descriptions:
Set in Marseille, just a 5-minute walk from Marseille Saint Charles Train Station, Toyoko INN Marseille Saint Charles features a garden and free WiFi. The hotel is easily accessible from A7 highway. Secured parking is provided but parking spots are limited and cannot be booked in advance.

The air-conditioned guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV, desk and a private bathroom with a bath.

Speaking English and French, staff are willing to help at any time of the day at the reception.

Marseille's Old Port is 1.1 km from the accommodation and Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre is 20 minutes' walk away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 20 km from Toyoko INN Marseille Saint Charles.

Hotels: Résidence Kley
Full_Descriptions:
Résidence Kley has a shared lounge, terrace, water sports facilities and tennis court in Marseille. Located around 1.1 km from Joliette Metro Station, the hotel with free WiFi is also 1.3 km away from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre. The accommodation offers evening entertainment and a shared kitchen.

At the hotel, the rooms have a desk. At Résidence Kley all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

You can play table tennis at the accommodation, and the area is popular for hiking and windsurfing.

Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station is 1.2 km from Résidence Kley, while Vieux Port Metro station is 1.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 21 km from the hotel.

Hotels: Residhotel Vieux Port
Full_Descriptions:
Residhotel Vieux Port is located in Marseille's city centre, in front of the old port and a 15-minute walk from both the Mucem Museum and les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre. It offers air-conditioned guest rooms with a private bathroom, flat-screen TVs and free WiFi.

Each spacious apartment has a kitchenette, a seating area and a flat-screen TV. Bed linen and towels are included.

A continental breakfast is available daily in the dining room. The reception is open every day from 07:30 to 12:30 and from 14:00 to 22:30.

Residhotel Vieux Port is in close proximity to the Palais de la Bourse and the Boulevard de la Canebière.

Vieux-Port Metro Station is just 200 metres from the property, and Saint-Charles train station is 1.3 km away. Public parking is available nearby.

Hotels: DANIEL
Full_Descriptions:
DANIEL features accommodation within 600 metres of the centre of Marseille, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a microwave, a fridge and a stovetop. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.2 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, 1.9 km from Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations and 1.8 km from Notre-Dame de la Garde Basilica. Plage des Catalans is 2.2 km from the apartment and La Timone Metro Station is 2.5 km away.

All units in the apartment complex are fitted with a coffee machine. There is a fully equipped private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Popular points of interest near DANIEL include Saint-Ferreol Street, Castellane Metro Station and Vieux Port Metro station. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 23 km from the accommodation.

Hotels: L'Orangeraie et la Palmeraie d'Endoume
Full_Descriptions:
Offering a garden, L'Orangeraie et la Palmeraie d'Endoume offers accommodation in Marseille. Palais du Pharo is 700 metres from the property. Free WiFi is available.

Each holiday home has a kitchen with a microwave, fridge, coffee machine and dishwasher. A flat-screen TV with cable channels is featured in each unit. All holiday homes have a bathroom with a bath or shower stocked with free toiletries. Each home also has a private terrace.

Orange Velodrome Stadium is 3 km from L'Orangeraie et la Palmeraie d'Endoume. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 21 km from L'Orangeraie et la Palmeraie d'Endoume. One free parking space is available on site, upon request and subject to availability and confirmation by the property.

Hotels: Odalys City Marseille Centre Euromed
Full_Descriptions:
Odalys City Marseille Centre Euromed is located in the Euromed - La Joliette district of Marseille, less than 1 km from Joliette Metro Station, a 10-minute walk from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre and 2.2 km from Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations. This 4-star aparthotel offers a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation provides a sauna, free WiFi throughout the property and family rooms.

Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. At the aparthotel, all units include bed linen and towels.

A selection of options including fresh pastries, fruits and juice is served for the buffet breakfast.

The aparthotel also features a plunge pool and a hammam for guests to relax in. A bicycle rental service is available at Odalys City Marseille Centre Euromed.

Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station is 1.9 km from the accommodation, while Vieux Port Metro station is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 20 km from Odalys City Marseille Centre Euromed.

Hotels: Holiday Inn Express Marseille Saint Charles, an IHG Hotel
Full_Descriptions:
Holiday Inn Express Marseille Saint Charles is opposite the train station and a 10-minute walk from the Vieux Port in Marseille’s city centre. It offers en suite rooms and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms at Holiday Inn Express Marseille Saint Charles are soundproofed and feature a modern décor. Each is air-conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

A complimentary breakfast is offered and Le Mistral bar serves light meals. Guests can relax on the outdoor terrace. Additional facilities include a 24-hour reception desk and a laundry service for an additional charge.

Saint-Charles Metro (lines 1 and 2), provide direct access to Parc Chanot and the city centre. Accessible from the A7, the hotel also offers private parking for an additional fee.

Hotels: PARADISE Earth & Sea
Full_Descriptions:
Providing city views, PARADISE Earth & Sea is located in the Vieux Port - La Canebière district of Marseille, 2.9 km from Fausse Monnaie and 400 metres from Vieux Port Metro station. There is a private entrance at the aparthotel for the convenience of those who stay. The property is 400 metres from the city centre and 2 km from Plage des Catalans.

The air-conditioned units have a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave, coffee machine, and a fridge. Featuring a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer, units at the aparthotel also offer free WiFi, while some rooms are equipped with a terrace. At the aparthotel, each unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Saint-Ferreol Street, Castellane Metro Station and Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 22 km from PARADISE Earth & Sea.

Hotels: New Hotel Le Quai - Vieux Port
Full_Descriptions:
New Hotel Le Quai - Vieux Port is located in central Marseille, overlooking the Old Port and La Canebière shopping street. This hotel offers soundproofed rooms with air-conditioning and satellite TV. Free WiFi access is available.

Entirely renovated in 2018 and 2019, the New Hotel is decorated in a colonial style and the rooms have a desk and a  private bathroom. They also have a a courtesy tray with a kettle. A bottle of water is offered upon arrival.

A buffet breakfast is served daily in the dining room or in guest rooms. The multilingual staff can also provide information on the local area at the 24-hour reception.

Famous landmarks close to the hotel include Notre Dame de la Garde, the Vieille Charité cultural centre, MUCEM museum, Pharo Palace and Saint Victor's Abbey.

New Hotel Le Quai - Vieux Port is situated opposite the Vieux-Port Hotel de Ville Metro Station and 300 metres from the Belsunce Alcazar Tramway. Chanot Exhibition Centre can be reached in 10 minutes on the metro. The Panier district is just a 10-minute walk away.

Hotels: Les Chambres de l'Abbaye
Full_Descriptions:
This B&B is set in central Marseille, just 270 metres from the Old Port. It is romantically decorated with antique furniture and guests are invited to relax in the garden or by the fireplace in the lounge.

The rooms are individually decorated and include a TV. Most rooms open up to a balcony with garden views, and one room has a private entrance with direct garden access.

Les Chambres de l’Abbaye serves a continental breakfast on the garden terrace on sunny mornings. Free WiFi is provided, and guests have access to a computer.

Private parking is available on site and Estrangin Préfecture Metro Station is 900 metres away. The B&B is 2.1 km from Marseille Train Station and 300 metres from the Abbey of St. Victor.

Hotels: Le Borély: Appartement climatisé avec 2 chambres, à 800m de la plage
Full_Descriptions:
Located in Marseille, just less than 1 km from Bonneveine, Le Borély: Appartement climatisé avec 2 chambres, à 800m de la plage provides beachfront accommodation with a garden, a terrace and free WiFi. The air-conditioned accommodation is 1.1 km from Plage de l'Huveaune. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.1 km from Borely.

The apartment is equipped with 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a toaster. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Orange Velodrome Stadium is 2.4 km from the apartment, while Rond-Point du Prado Metro Station is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 28 km from Le Borély: Appartement climatisé avec 2 chambres, à 800m de la plage.

Hotels: Citadines Castellane Marseille
Full_Descriptions:
This Citadines offers self-catered apartments in Marseille, a 3-minute drive from the A50 motorway, 5-minutes’ walk from Castellane Metro and 2 km from the Velodrome Stadium. Each apartment has an equipped kitchen and free internet.

Breakfast is available in the mornings and can be enjoyed on the terrace.

Guests can visit the Prado beaches, situated a 10-minute drive from the Citadines Apart'hotel Marseille Castellane.

Each of the Citadines’ apartments also has a comfortable seating area and a TV. Each kitchen is equipped with a microwave, fridge and electric hobs.

Hotels: Vieux Port République Cannebiére
Full_Descriptions:
Set in the centre of Marseille, just 1.9 km from Plage des Catalans and 100 metres from Vieux Port Metro station, Vieux Port République Cannebiére offers accommodation with sea views and free WiFi. It is situated 700 metres from Saint-Ferreol Street and features full-day security. The apartment features family rooms.

The units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with slippers, a shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Marseille, like windsurfing, diving and fishing. Hiking can be enjoyed nearby.

Popular points of interest near Vieux Port République Cannebiére include Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations, Joliette Metro Station and Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 22 km from the accommodation.

Hotels: Le Ryad Boutique Hôtel
Full_Descriptions:
Le Ryad is located in the heart of Marseille, just 50 metres from La Canebiere and 1 km from the Old Port. It offers Moroccan-style rooms with free Wi-Fi internet access.

With a courtyard and an oriental garden, Le Ryad offers a range of uniquely decorated rooms, accessed through a staircase. Each is equipped with air conditioning and a private bathroom.

There is a tea salon open daily that serves mint tea, fruit juices and Moroccan pastries.

There are 2 breakfast options, a simple one and another one including fresh orange juice, fresh fruit salad, Moroccan crepe, yogurt, croissants, bread, butter, honey, jam and hot beverage.

Le Ryad is 300 metres from the Reformés Canebiere Metro Station, and 850 metres from the Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station. Public parking is available 100 metres from the property.

Hotels: Ibis Budget Marseille Timone
Full_Descriptions:
Ibis Budget Marseille Timone is located in Marseille, a 5-minute walk from Vallier Stadium. Free WiFi access is available. Private bathroom also comes with a shower. The property is 3 km from Le Dôme Concert Hall, Vélodrome Stadium and Parc Chanot.

The hotel is 500 metres from La Timone Metro Station, 1.7 km from Castellane Metro Station and 2.1 km from Vieux Port Metro station. Marseille Provence Airport is 22 km away.

Hotels: 2 BR Cocon à 3min du Vieux Port
Full_Descriptions:
In the centre of Marseille, located within a short distance of Saint-Ferreol Street and Castellane Metro Station, 2 BR Cocon à 3min du Vieux Port offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. This recently renovated apartment is located 2.1 km from Plage des Catalans and 400 metres from Vieux Port Metro station. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.1 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station.

The 2-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations, Joliette Metro Station and Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 23 km from 2 BR Cocon à 3min du Vieux Port.

Hotels: Le Duplex - Terrasse au cœur de Marseille Panier
Full_Descriptions:
Right in the heart of Marseille, situated within a short distance of Joliette Metro Station and Vieux Port Metro station, Le Duplex - Terrasse au cœur de Marseille Panier offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a dishwasher and coffee machine. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a patio. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.3 km from Plage des Catalans.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views.

Guests can relax in the garden at the property.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre, Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations and Saint-Ferreol Street. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 21 km from Le Duplex - Terrasse au cœur de Marseille Panier.

Hotels: ADIRA Résid'Marseille Vieux-port
Full_Descriptions:
Offering free WiFi and city views, ADIRA Résid'Marseille Vieux-port is an accommodation situated right in the centre of Marseille, just 300 metres from Saint-Ferreol Street and 1.2 km from Castellane Metro Station. This recently renovated apartment is located 2 km from Plage des Catalans and 400 metres from Vieux Port Metro station. The apartment has family rooms.

All units in the apartment complex are fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer and a shower. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units include bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations and Joliette Metro Station. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 23 km from ADIRA Résid'Marseille Vieux-port.

Hotels: Appart'City Classic Marseille Euromed
Full_Descriptions:
Located in Marseille, Appart’City Marseille Euromed offers non-smoking, self-catering accommodation. Guests can access both the Old Port and the train station from the 2 tram stops located within 350 metres of the property. Free fiber optic internet access is available.

Each unit features a desk, a flat-screen TV and views of the city. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and a shower.

Guests can prepare their own meals at Appart’City Marseille Euromed. A kitchenette equipped with a microwave, kitchenware and a fridge is available in each accommodation. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at an extra cost. Breakfast is composed of various breads, including gluten-free bread, pastries, fresh and hot beverages. Fresh fruit and fruit salad, as well as cheeses and yogurts are also provided.

This property is 7 km from Prado Beach and 4 km from Notre-Dame de la Garde. The Terrasses du Port shopping centre and the maritime port are both a 10-minute walk away. Private parking is available on site for an extra cost and upon reservation.

Hotels: Staycity Aparthotels Marseille Centre Vieux Port
Full_Descriptions:
Featuring free WiFi, Staycity Aparthotels Marseille Centre Vieux Port offers air-conditioned accommodation in Marseille, only 550 metres from the port. Marseille Saint-Charles train station is a 12-minute walk away from the property.

All apartments and studios are accessible via a lift and feature a flat-screen TV. Each unit has a kitchenette fitted with a dishwasher, microwave, toaster, fridge, stovetop, coffee machine and kettle. There is a private bathroom with free toiletries in each unit. Towels and bed linen are offered.

Bars, shops and restaurants can be found within a 2-minute walk of the property.

The nearest metro station is only 44 metres from the property. Velodrome Stadium is 6.4 km from Staycity Aparthotels Marseille, while La Canebiere is 1 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 24 km from the property.

Some units come with a balcony.

Hotels: Love room Jacuzzi Sauna Privatif Marseille
Full_Descriptions:
Love room Jacuzzi Sauna Privatif Marseille provides a sauna and a hot tub, as well as air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi in Marseille, 8.5 km from La Timone Metro Station. The accommodation features a spa bath and a hot tub. The apartment has facilities for disabled guests.

Featuring a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, each unit also comes with a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa. A fridge and kitchenware are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Castellane Metro Station is 9.2 km from the apartment, while Marseille Chanot Exhibition and Convention Centre is 9.4 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 30 km from Love room Jacuzzi Sauna Privatif Marseille.

Hotels: Studio inspiration luxury hotel Vieux-Port
Full_Descriptions:
Located in Marseille, 2.9 km from Fausse Monnaie and 500 metres from Vieux Port Metro station, Studio inspiration luxury hotel Vieux-Port offers air conditioning. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 2 km from Joliette Metro Station, 1.5 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station and 1.5 km from Notre-Dame de la Garde Basilica. The property is 400 metres from the city centre and 2.2 km from Plage des Catalans.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment provides a flat-screen TV and a kitchen with an oven and microwave. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Saint-Ferreol Street, Castellane Metro Station and Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 22 km from Studio inspiration luxury hotel Vieux-Port.

Hotels: 3 NIGHTS MINIMUM, Renovated entire flat, city of Marseille, 4 people, 1first floor
Full_Descriptions:
3 NIGHTS MINIMUM, Renovated entire flat, city of Marseille, 4 people in Marseille features accommodation with free WiFi, 1.5 km from Castellane Metro Station, 1.4 km from La Timone Metro Station and 1.5 km from Saint-Ferreol Street. Hotels: Golden Tulip Villa Massalia
Full_Descriptions:
A 7-minute walk from the beach, Golden Tulip Villa Massalia is 3.5 km from Velodrome Stadium and 6 km from Les Goudes. It offers luxury accommodation with an outdoor pool open in the season and free WiFi.

The air-conditioned rooms offer a flat-screen TV and a safe. Deluxe rooms feature a balcony or terrace with panoramic sea views. The bathrooms have a hairdryer, toiletries, bath robes and slippers. A bottle of water is offered upon arrival.

Golden Tulip Villa Massalia's restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine. During fine weather guests can dine on the terrace overlooking the racecourse. The hotel bar is open every day and serves cocktails and snacks.

Marseilles city centre is 5 km away. Villa Massalia can be accessed from the airport, a 35-minute drive away or Gare Saint Charles, a 20-minute drive from the hotel.

Hotels: #LaFrenchCasa Belsunce
Full_Descriptions:
#LaFrenchCasa Belsunce is set in the Vieux Port - La Canebière district of Marseille, 700 metres from Vieux Port Metro station, 1.5 km from Joliette Metro Station and 600 metres from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The property is less than 1 km from the city centre and 2.5 km from Plage des Catalans.

The air-conditioned units have a fully equipped kitchen with dining area, an oven, coffee machine, and a microwave. Some units feature a seating area and/or a terrace with an outdoor dining area. All units have a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre, Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations and Saint-Ferreol Street. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 22 km from #LaFrenchCasa Belsunce.

Hotels: Aparthotel Adagio Access Marseille Saint Charles
Full_Descriptions:
Located just 100 metres from Saint Charles Train Station, Aparthotel Adagio Access Marseille Saint Charles offers spacious accommodation. Marseille's city centre is just a 10-minute walk away.

The modern air-conditioned studios and apartments have free WiFi and are serviced by a lift. The fully equipped kitchen or kitchenette features a microwave and a refrigerator.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room and children from 4 to 11 years old can enjoy it at a reduced rate.

Additional facilities at Adagio Access Marseille Saint Charles include a 24-hour reception.

The Old Port and Longchamp Park are both a 20-minute walk from this eco-friendly hotel. Marseille Provence Airport is 26 km away, which is accessible by a local shuttle bus.

Hotels: Residhotel Vieux Port
Full_Descriptions:
Residhotel Vieux Port is located in Marseille's city centre, in front of the old port and a 15-minute walk from both the Mucem Museum and les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre. It offers air-conditioned guest rooms with a private bathroom, flat-screen TVs and free WiFi.

Each spacious apartment has a kitchenette, a seating area and a flat-screen TV. Bed linen and towels are included.

Residhotel Vieux Port is in close proximity to the Palais de la Bourse and the Boulevard de la Canebière.

Vieux-Port Metro Station is just 200 metres from the property, and Saint-Charles train station is 1.3 km away. Public parking is available nearby.

Hotels: Le Couvent Marseille
Full_Descriptions:
Le Couvent Marseille features accommodation within 800 metres of the centre of Marseille, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. The air-conditioned accommodation is 2.2 km from Plage des Catalans. The aparthotel has private entrance.

At the aparthotel, each unit has a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the aparthotel, every unit is fitted with a seating area.

Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations, Vieux Port Metro station and Joliette Metro Station. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 21 km from Le Couvent Marseille.

Hotels: Le Transvaal-Maison d'Hôtes
Full_Descriptions:
Offering city views, Le Transvaal-Maison d'Hôtes is an accommodation located in Marseille, 2.4 km from La Timone Metro Station and 3.3 km from Vieux Port Metro station. This bed and breakfast provides air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

At the bed and breakfast, the units include a wardrobe. Each unit is equipped with a kettle and a private bathroom, while some rooms are equipped with a terrace and some have garden views. At the bed and breakfast, units come with bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop and lounge.

Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station is 3.5 km from the bed and breakfast, while Castellane Metro Station is 3.7 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 24 km from Le Transvaal-Maison d'Hôtes.

Hotels: Radisson Blu Hotel Marseille Vieux Port
Full_Descriptions:
Located in Marseille overlooking the Vieux Port, Radisson Blu Hotel Marseille Vieux Port is a 4-star hotel. It offers an outdoor swimming pool overlooking Fort Saint-Nicholas and a fitness room with a panoramic view of the main monuments of the city. Free WiFi access is available.

The air-conditioned guest rooms feature either a Provencal or an African décor. Some rooms have a view of the port and a Nespresso coffee machine. Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Bathrobes and slippers are provided in the suites.

The Quai du 7eme restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine and proposes buffet breakfast every morning and guests can also enjoy cocktails and tapas in the Bar, with a view over the port.

A boules pitch can be enjoyed on the interior courtyard. With a 24-hour reception, Radisson Blu Hotel Marseille Vieux Port is also partnered with the 5 Mondes Spa just 40 metres away, where beauty treatments are possible at a discounted rate.

Indigo La Criée Car Park is just 80 metres away, available for an additional charge.

Hotels: 14 THU Happynest, charmant appartement coeur de Marseille
Full_Descriptions:
14 THU Happynest, charmant appartement coeur de Marseille is located in the Vieux Port - La Canebière district of Marseille, 1.5 km from Joliette Metro Station, less than 1 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station and 1.7 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre. It is situated 500 metres from Vieux Port Metro station and provides a lift. The property is 2.3 km from Plage des Catalans, and within 800 metres of the city centre.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment features a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and fridge. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations, Saint-Ferreol Street and Castellane Metro Station. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 22 km from 14 THU Happynest, charmant appartement coeur de Marseille.

Hotels: Hotel C2
Full_Descriptions:
Featuring a grand piano, HOTEL C2, located in the Pierre Puget courtyard in Marseille, is a 19th-century private mansion converted into a hotel. It features the original marble and parquet floors, columns, bas-relief sculptures, frescoes and bronze banisters, whilst offering a minimalist, contemporary twist. It opened in April 2014.

The light and airy guest rooms are spacious with designer furnishings and have a private bathroom.

A bar and meeting room. The hotel's specially-chartered boat leaves from the Vieux Port, and is available with the beach package. Each month the hotel also hosts art and photographic exhibitions and performances.

Hotels: DANIEL
Full_Descriptions:
DANIEL features accommodation within 600 metres of the centre of Marseille, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a microwave, a fridge and a stovetop. This B&B is set in a three-storey Provençal farmhouse and features en suite accommodations with a country décor, an outdoor swimming pool and a hot tub. Notre-Dame du Mont Metro Station is 220 metres away and Velodrome Stadium is 3 km from the property.

With antique furniture, each room at Un Mas en Ville includes a private bathroom with bathrobe, hairdryer and shower. Free WiFi is provided throughout.

Homemade jams, honey, traditional gingerbread, brioches and pastries are served in the organic breakfast. A common kitchen is at guests’ disposal if they want to reheat their meals bought outside or delivered.

The Opéra is a 10-minute walk away and Notre-Dame de la Garde Basilica is 2 km away. Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station is 1.6 km away and the A7 Motorway access is a 6-minute drive from Un Mas en Ville. Public parking is available nearby for an extra charge.

Offering sea views, LOFT LE BER'AMAR L'ESTAQUE is an accommodation located in Marseille, 2.9 km from Plage du Fontin and 9.1 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre. Both free WiFi and parking on-site are available at the apartment free of charge. The property is non-smoking and is set 9.3 km from Joliette Metro Station.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Guests at LOFT LE BER'AMAR L'ESTAQUE will be able to enjoy activities in and around Marseille, like fishing and hiking.

Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations is 10 km from the accommodation, while Vieux Port Metro station is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 17 km from LOFT LE BER'AMAR L'ESTAQUE.

Hotels: Plein cœur de Marseille la plaine
Full_Descriptions:
Located 700 metres from Saint-Ferreol Street, 1.1 km from Castellane Metro Station and 1.2 km from Vieux Port Metro station, Plein cœur de Marseille la plaine provides accommodation situated in Marseille. The property is set 1.6 km from La Timone Metro Station, 1.3 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station and 2.9 km from Notre-Dame de la Garde Basilica. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Plage des Catalans is 2.9 km away.

This apartment is equipped with 2 bedrooms, a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom equipped with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The apartment is allergy-free and soundproof.

Palais du Pharo is 3 km from Plein cœur de Marseille la plaine, while Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations is 3 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 23 km from the accommodation.

Hotels: GuestReady - Charming retreat near the beach
Full_Descriptions:
Located in Marseille, near Fausse Monnaie, Plage de Maldorme and Palais du Pharo, GuestReady - Charming retreat near the beach features free WiFi. The property is around 1.6 km from Vieux Port Metro station, 2 km from Saint-Ferreol Street and 1.8 km from Notre-Dame de la Garde Basilica. The property is 1.1 km from the city centre and 400 metres from Plage des Catalans.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Joliette Metro Station is 2.8 km from the apartment, while Castellane Metro Station is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 23 km from GuestReady - Charming retreat near the beach.

Hotels: Love Time
Full_Descriptions:
Set in Marseille, 4.3 km from La Timone Metro Station and 5.5 km from Vieux Port Metro station, Love Time offers air conditioning. Both free WiFi and parking on-site are accessible at the holiday home free of charge. The property is non-smoking and is located 5.6 km from Castellane Metro Station.

The holiday home has 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom with a hot tub. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station is 5.7 km from Love Time, while Saint-Ferreol Street is 6.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 24 km from the accommodation.

Hotels: Residence Services Calypso Calanques Plage
Full_Descriptions:
Residence Services Calypso Calanques Plage is in the Bonneveine residential area in Marseille, a 15-minute walk from the beaches and the Veldrome Stadium. The Calanques National Park and Borely Park are 10 minutes’ drive away. It offers free WiFi access.

Each spacious apartment at the Residence Services Calypso Calanques Plage is air conditioned and soundproofed, and features a flat-screen TV. The kitchenettes are equipped with cooking facilities, a fridge and a microwave. Bed linen is included.

Facilities at the Calypso include a vending machine and a launderette.

The bus stops for numbers 23 and 45 can be found 2-minute walk away, which provide access to Metro Rond Point du Prado and to the Calanques in 10 minutes. A Velo Bleu bike stop is 5 minutes’ walk away.

There is a private underground car park on site for an additional charge, or a further outdoor car park free of charge.

Hotels: Le Mucem du Vieux Port
Full_Descriptions:
Le Mucem du Vieux Port is located in the Vieux Port - La Canebière district of Marseille, 1.2 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre, 600 metres from Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations and less than 1 km from Vieux Port Metro station. It is situated 1 km from Joliette Metro Station and provides a lift. The property is less than 1 km from the city centre and 2.3 km from Plage des Catalans.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment features a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and fridge. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station is 1.8 km from the apartment, while Saint-Ferreol Street is 1.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 21 km from Le Mucem du Vieux Port.

Hotels: Spacious apartment near the sea
Full_Descriptions:
Offering city views, Spacious apartment near the sea is an accommodation situated in Marseille, less than 1 km from Plage de la Vieille Chapelle and a 14-minute walk from Bonneveine. The property is located 4.1 km from Orange Velodrome Stadium, 4.3 km from Rond-Point du Prado Metro Station and 4.3 km from Marseille Chanot Exhibition and Convention Centre. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Plage de la Pointe Rouge is 100 metres away.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with an a bath or shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Castellane Metro Station is 5.8 km from the apartment, while Notre-Dame de la Garde Basilica is 6.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 30 km from Spacious apartment near the sea.

Hotels: Appartement tout équipé traversant 6 à 8 couchages
Full_Descriptions:
Appartement tout équipé traversant 6 à 8 couchages is set in Marseille, 6.1 km from Castellane Metro Station, 6.1 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, as well as 6.5 km from Saint-Ferreol Street. It is located 6 km from Vieux Port Metro station and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and La Timone Metro Station is 4.7 km away.

The spacious apartment is equipped with 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a fridge. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Joliette Metro Station is 6.7 km from the apartment, while Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre is 6.9 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 23 km from Appartement tout équipé traversant 6 à 8 couchages.
